meanings.sent1: The seedsmen at the market had a wide variety of seeds for sale.
meanings.sent2: The local seedsmen always had the best quality seeds for gardening.
meanings.sent3: The seedsmen decided to have a seed-spitting contest for fun.
meanings.sent4: The seedsmen scattered their seeds of knowledge in the community.
meanings.sent5: The colorful display of seeds by the seedsmen caught everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: The seedsmen were busy packaging seeds for their customers.
meanings.sent2: I visited the seedsmen to buy different types of seeds for my garden.
meanings.sent3: The seedsmen formed a band called 'The Seedlings' for a charity event.
meanings.sent4: The seedsmen stood tall like mighty trees in the world of gardening.
meanings.sent5: The seedsmen worked together like a well-oiled machine to fulfill orders.
